name: Frank Antonucci
text: Great Pizza. The staff has a tendency to overload their pizzas with cheese, which makes for a soggy pizza. Dough, tomato sauce are very tasty. I ask for an olive oil drizzle before & after baking. My only issue is that the young staff does ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Ponessa
text: Truly incredible. Friendliest staff, best ingredients, total pizza freedom. Pro tip, get the high rise dough if you're going to overload your pizza with toppings.

name: Jed Elmaleh
text: I was excited to try best new play that was very disappointed. Everything I ordered was so salty that it was an edible, a waste of money. Maybe once they're better established they'll get better

name: Zack Blackford
text: Great price, great pizza with tons of toppings! No extra charge for extra toppings!

name: Andre Meaux
text: Loved Blaze Pizza!! The pizza was great and there were a lot of unique toppings and options which is a definite plus. The Greek Salad was amazing!! I'd go back simply for the Greek salad! Also, love that they do NOT have plastic straws! Can't wait to go again.

name: Winnie Miller
text: Good place for a quick pizza; it's one price for whatever you want on it, with upcharge for extras such as cauliflower pizza, etc. We will be back!!!üòçüòç

name: ashley massey
text: Absolutely love blaze pizza. So far it's the best we've found moving down here.  I tried their cauliflower crust today and it was amazing. They have the friendliest staff  as well!

name: Connie McDaniel
text: Friendly, quick but tasty, fresh ingredients!! Several options for crust, sauce & toppings. I'm not a big pizza fan but would definitely go again.

name: Sam Moore
text: When you search this on apple maps, it says the place closes at 11pm. I went in on 935pm and they were cleaning up. I asked if they closed at 11 and they said no 10pm and I stood there expecting to still get a quick pizza made hoping they ‚Ä¶More

name: Kala Fisher
text: I loved the employees, the food was good.

name: Angie Bakewell
text: Really great pizza, delicious crust - made to order individual size. You can also build your own salad and the dressings were very good. Bigger sized individual pizzas compared to other places like this. Ladies that were running the store were very friendly and accommodating to our requests.

name: Bill Barber
text: Ordered carry out, arrived about 20 mins after order to find pizza sitting on a rack open to anyone not being kept hot in anyway.  Actually there were two other customers standing in front of the rack.  The pizza was cold and a sloppy mess ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Lukasik
text: I love their pizza and layout. Also the only place I can find with a keto option. Showed up just before closing and they were super friendly and helpful. I know how it can be when people show up late and I never felt rushed or put out.

name: Wil Busby
text: Great service, great food- very courteous!

name: ANDREW CHMIEL
text:
I great Build your own pizza for 9 Bucks !
Will Be back! Add all the topping you want!
They have thick, thin,  gluten free  and cauliflower crust!

name: Jeremy Lindsay
text: Frequent often. Great pizza at a decent price. Would've been 5 star if they would remember to add the arugula like I request...every time

name: David Wilson
text: Affordable, fast, and made your way. It's like a sub shop for pizza. Never been dissapointed. It also has tea/lemonade and soda varieties you don't find other places.

name: Allie Douglas
text: The pizza is the best ever! I love picking strange combinations of toppings! The ingredients are fresh and they have lots of (expensive) healthy options for crust for those with allergies. The employees are kind of slow moving and ‚Ä¶More

name: Jarika McDaniel
text: I‚Äôm so sad. My very first time I came in I fell In love, EVERY time since my pizza or dough knots are burnt black. Not just a section, the whole bottom of my pizza is black. Was looking forward to it all day. ‚Ä¶More

name: Justin Wisniewski
text: Got the bbq chicken pizza, just didn't taste right.

name: Brooke Gabellieri
text: I went into Blaze Pizza for the first time yesterday evening and was warmly greeted by the employees.  They were friendly and very helpful explaining the menu as I had not been to their location before.  I have a peanut/nut allergy and the ‚Ä¶More

name: ReddHott SC
text: I love this place. You can get as much as you want on a pizza for 8.95. They have a very large selection of delicious beverages.

name: Latrice Ford
text: The toppings were fresh, but the dough was undercooked. Fast delivery with DoorDash, though.

name: lydia Ackerman
text: My pizza order is anything but normal. They made it to order and it was very tasty! Thank you for not judging and making my pizza perfect for me.

name: J Terry
text: Best pizza ever, some issues.  Subway but pizza.  8.95 all the toppings you want for a personal pizza. The biggest issue is they need to keep your groups orders together. We were only two and my wife's was ready 10 min before mine. She ‚Ä¶More

name: Janice Zuchowski
text: Was there yesterday afternoon for the first time and even said that I needed to read menu. The staff was okay and just pointed to pictures. The Cobb said was extremely good. We got a White Top and a Meat Lovers. The pizza was just okay. Nothing spectacular. It was bland. I would go back just for the salad.

name: Shawna Galecki
text: Terrible service. Went in an hour before they closed with a friend and we were greeted with annoyed workers. Very unfriendly.

name: Tom Ellison
text: This place is amazing!  Think Mod Pizza or Pie Five but better!  Flavors are incredible, high quality ingredients, plenty of choice, and friendly staff.  Little on the pricey side but worth the cost.

name: Phillip Bobbitt
text: Outstanding üçï. Wish they had another location closer to where I live. However I'll still üöó to Mt. Pleasant to eat it. Once the get their license for beer, it will be even better.

name: Anna Kate Maginn
text: Delicious, fast and easy! Really excited to have this as a new pizza spot. Super friendly staff- definitely recommend!

name: Brian Richardson
text: I ordered their specialty bbq chicken.  It was completely over topped so soggy. The staff is miserable. No hello,  thank you,  eye contact.  Nothing.  Might as well let the robots take over.

name: Eric White
text: Great pizza! Quick. Build your own with a variety of sauces and toppings.

name: Emerson Carl
text: Small pizza.  Too expensive.  Went there on grand opening..got a $8 that ended up costing $14.  Ordered online today for a large pizza that will "feed the family".  $20!  A 10" pizza barely feed myself and my wife.  No different from the grand opening 8/14 $ pizza.  Bottem line..no more blaze pizza!  Oh..the ingredients are good.

name: Kyle Goncz
text: Our favorite pizza place hands down, and exceptional service!

name: Eric Montiel
text: You get a lot of bang for your buck here. The ingredients are really good and its cooked very well.  Pick up orders seem iffy as it is brand new, but I can't stop eating here.

name: Trey Baker
text: This place is just plain awesome. Very friendly young staff, great pizza

name: Tyson Slater
text: Rated best fast food pizza in America for a reason. Quick, simply good pizza in a clean dining room.

name: Brittany Holloway
text: Fast and great food

name: Heather Anderson
text: Awesome place for each family member to choose their own flavor!

name: Kate Wenger
text: Great pizza! Fast, friendly service! We will certainly be back!

name: Kasie Dugan
text: We weren‚Äôt too impressed with our visit. The service was really slow and inefficient. I didn‚Äôt like that there weren‚Äôt different pizza sizes I could choose from and the overall food taste and quality wasn‚Äôt that great. I‚Äôll stick with MOD pizza if I want a build your own pizza experience.

name: El Tee

text:
Great and easy service, great tasting pizza (the ingredients were VERY fresh)

Prices were reasonable as well ‚Ä¶More

name: Terry Whitt
text: I loved picking what I wanted on my thin crust pizza

name: Jessica Miller
text: Slowest pizza everrrr, but sooooo good!

name: Peter Parkerson
text: Tried to order a pizza and sat in line for 20 min and line never moved. There were only 3 people in front of me. Lousy process!  Thought it‚Äôd be like a Chipotle but their system and service suck!!! We left for Boxcar Betty‚Äôs. Avoid Blaze!

name: Erika Anderson Lloyd
text: Quite honestly the worst "fresh" pizza I've ever had. The staff ignores you and our pick up order came in batches 15 minutes apart.

text: Best pizza in town!

text: Good pizza kid friendly
